OrgName: Johnson & Johnson Consumer Products Company, Division of Johnson & Johnson Consumer Companies, Inc.
activities: Johnson & Johnson Consumer Products Company receives personal information in various forms relating to personnel, including prospective and former employees. These data may be transferred from the EU/Switzerland to the US and are used to carry out the company’s human resource function. Please contact us with any questions about the way in which we process personal data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities Panel (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
